subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Mariano Rivera has another solid season, the Red Sox and other teams will be eager to lure him away from the Yankees. But on Saturday, he said he could not envision himself pitching for Boston.
snippet: If Mariano Rivera has another solid season, the Red Sox and other teams will be eager to lure him away from the Yankees. But on Saturday, he said he could not envision himself pitching for Boston.
